alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:52PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Navajo Counties through 600 PM MST... At 451 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrizo, or 19 miles southwest of Show Low, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrizo, Lake Of The Woods--Pinetop-lakeside, Fort Apache Reservation, North Fork, White Mountain Apache Reservation, Lakeside Campground, and Cibecue. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 350 and 352. State Route 73 between mile markers 311 and 318. Highway 60 between mile markers 308 and 333. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County; White Mountains
